text:
@realDonaldTrump @narendramodi Donald Trump keeps talking about "the invisible enemy" that has killed nearly 100,000 Americans and crippled our Obama-generated thriving economy.

Truth: The coronavirus catastrophe was apparent for months. Bells and whistles going off. He ignored everything. He owns this mess. https://t.co/HBHIC2I1sn
